71FC960B4753E1ACEEFF3C87840C6AAF: Determines how much damage the device can take before destruction.
E6A793AE4FCAF9E242ECD2B03B5DF028: Transmits a signal on the selected channel when a player enters the spawned vehicle.
649FBA8743675F1F4DCB25BDD7BFEE08: Transmits a signal on the selected channel when a player exits the spawned vehicle.
76E481C64208C249217628B352E744E2: Transmits a signal when a vehicle is destroyed.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.On: A player enters the spawned vehicle
A player exits the spawned vehicle
A vehicle is spawned or respawned.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.App: Apply off-road tires to the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Veh: Determines how much damage the vehicle can take before destruction.
Determines if the Vehicle can be destroyed by damage.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Des: Determines if the Vehicle will destroy itself when stuck underwater.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Ena: Determines if the Vehicle will respawn after being destroyed.
Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. If set to CREATE ONLY, will only be enabled while editing your Island.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Vis: Determines whether the device is visible during the game. This does affect its collision properties.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Dis: Disable the Vehicle Spawner, stopping it from spawning any more vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Ena: Enable the Vehicle Spawner, allowing it to spawn vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.All: If set to All, All Classes (including players with NO CLASS) are affected. Otherwise, the chosen Class will be used to determine the Affects Class effect. ANY CLASS - Players with a Class assigned, regardless of what Class it is. NO CLASS - Players without any assigned class.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Des: If the vehicle that this spawner created still exists, destroy it.
ON will destroy an already spawned vehicle when this spawner is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Pop: Pop all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to pop.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Rep: Repair all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to repair.
Restore the spawned vehicle to full health.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Rem: Revert to road tires on the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Ass: Seats the player that instigated the message as the spawned vehicle's driver.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Res: Spawns the vehicle (Destroying the existing vehicle if it still exists).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Act: The Team this device belongs to.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Wat: When the vehicle becomes too deep in water to drive, destroy it after this delay.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedAntiVehicleTurret_V2_C.Res: When the vehicle is destroyed, respawn it after this delay. (The first vehicle spawned does not use this delay.)
YES will spawn a vehicle when the device is enabled. ONLY IF NEEDED will not reset an existing vehicle.
